txt.en:
'I have received a great many complaints lately concerning the amount of time it takes the Quick Post service to deliver packages and mail. Admittedly, most of those complaints have come from Lobelia Sackville-Baggins and her son Lotho, but some respectable hobbits have complained as well. We need to do something about this, certainly!

'If you'd like to help out, there on the table you will find a satchel for delivery to Postman Boffin in Overhill. Overhill is a good distance north of here, nestled in the Bindbole Wood, and Postman Boffin should be right in the centre of town.

'Look out for nosey hobbits, for they will delay you and keep you from delivering the mail on time, and don't let the mail satchel get wet! If the ink on the letters runs, the good hobbits of Overhill are sure to be upset with us.'
'The satchel for Overhill is over there on the table. Take it to Postman Boffin in the centre of Overhill, and let no nosey hobbits interfere in your duty!'
Postman Grubb of Hobbiton has asked you to deliver a satchel to Overhill.
You have failed to deliver the satchel
You were spotted by a nosey hobbit
Collect the satchel from Postman Grubb's table

Postman Boffin can be found in the centre of Overhill, far to the north of Hobbiton.\n\nDeliver the satchel to Postman Boffin in Overhill as quickly as possible. Let no nosey hobbits interfere with your duty, and do not let the mail satchel get wet!
Carry satchel to Postman Boffin in Overhill
